file_content.text: I can't hold off attacking the lab forever. Destroy the rakghoul infestation.
Attention on deck!
I'm tracking a Jedi, and I need immediate access to the research laboratory in this sector.
You're talking about the Godera laboratory...?
Apologies, sir. I didn't realize we were to be honored by the Hand of Jadus. Lieutenant Needa, liaison officer.
Apologies, sir. I didn't realize you were coming. Lieutenant Needa, liaison officer.
Cipher Nine. You run a tight ship.
I appreciate the welcome.
Thank you, sir. And you are...?
I'm your mother with a shaved head and an assault rifle. Breeze off.
Not everyone here would appreciate that tone.
Vector Hyllus, Dawn Herald of Oroboro. Do you have a brother?
Yes, sir. Aboard the Sting.
We served with him as envoy to the Tion Cluster. He's a good man.
Ensign Raina Temple. No longer of the Chiss, I suppose.
Credit goes to Darth Gravus, but I share his pride.
I wasn't expecting to be recognized.
You know who I am?
I asked that all Intelligence arrivals be flagged. When I saw your designation, well--I try to stay abreast of affairs.
I asked that all Intelligence arrivals be flagged. Aside from the Sith, you're our most important resource.
Contacting the laboratory for clearance, sir.
Don't waste my time. The Godera lab--where is it?
Just give me the information.
Just a few klicks from base, sir. I'll contact it for you.
Your associate should be at the lab already--he took a security team about a week ago. You'll find it in good hands.
What are you talking about? Who's at the lab?
My "associate"?
He was from Imperial Intelligence. I assumed you were together.
Yes. I'm sure everything will be fine.
Of course...
I wasn't expecting anyone. You may have a security breach on your hands.
That doesn't sound right.
Sir? He was from Imperial Intelligence. His credentials were in order...
I can't pick up anything from the laboratory comm. But there's something on a secondary channel.
--to base. Doctor Lokin is safe, but the rakghouls are everywhere. Orange-level infestation. Will attempt to--
Get it back!
I can't. Our team must've been overrun by the rakghouls; we'll have to burn the whole lab...
No one does anything until I understand the situation.
Tell me what's going on.
This rakghoul infestation--what is it?
What's a rakghoul?
Destroying that facility will disrupt an Imperial Intelligence operation. Am I clear?
I need that lab!
Clear, sir.
The rakghouls are mutants--victims of a Tarisian plague that alters human physiology.
Standing orders are to cluster bomb nest sites to contain the infestation.
You want to reach the lab to track your Jedi, you'll be facing a swarm. I can't offer anything but aerial bombardment.
Put your bombers on hold. I can cleanse the area.
I'll handle it myself.
Your security officer said "Doctor Lokin" was safe. Who's Doctor Lokin?
That message mentioned a name.
He's the Intelligence officer I mentioned. I don't know much else.
If you need him, I can put the bombers on hold--but you'll have to clear the rakghouls manually.
Use gas bombs, radiation blasts, anything non-destructive. I need the lab intact.
Find another way.
Those aren't as effective--you'll still need to clear the area, but... I'll do what I can.
You take me to the best places. We go looking for a Jedi, you show me a rakghoul nest....
There's a chance our body can resist the rakghoul plague. But we'd rather not find out, even to locate a Jedi.
I'm looking forward to seeing your tactics here, sir. I've never been to a nest--or tracked a Jedi.
Good luck, sir.
I'll be with you in a moment, sir.
